3.content: Tesla's revenue has been steadily increasing since its creation in 2010. In 2022, the annual revenue was $81.462 billion, a 51.35% increase from the previous year. In 2021, the annual revenue was $53.823 billion, a 70.67% increase from the previous year. In 2020, the annual revenue was $31.536 billion, a 28.31% increase from the previous year. The revenue for the quarter ending June 30, 2023, was $24.927 billion, a 47.2% increase year-over-year.

The text provides information on Tesla's annual and quarterly revenue from 2010 to 2023. It states that Tesla's revenue for the quarter ending June 30, 2023, was $24.927 billion, a 47.2% increase year-over-year. The annual revenue for 2022 was $81.462 billion, a 51.35% increase from 2021. The annual revenue for 2021 was $53.823 billion, a 70.67% increase from 2020. The annual revenue for 2020 was $31.536 billion, a 28.31% increase from 2019. The text also mentions that Tesla is the market leader in battery-powered electric car sales in the United States and has a market capitalization of over $1 trillion.
